original_title: Two buses collide head-on at Kajugama on Colombo-Kandy Road; 23 injured
original_body_lines: At least 23 people, including two children, were injured in a road accident that took place at Bataliya in Kajugama on the Colombo-Kandy Main Road this morning.
Police said a private bus coming from Kandy to Negombo and a CTB bus heading to Muthur from Colombo crashed head-on.
The injured were admitted to the Wathupitiwala Hospital. Hospital sources said that that the injuries to the passengers due to the accident were not serious. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
